DOC.brief_summary: The goal study evaluate long term durability hemodynamic effect implant stent aortic arch pulmonary artery branch .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients underwent trans-catheter implantation balloon expand stent aortic arch branch pulmonary artery evaluate physical examination blood pressure value measurement upper low limb . Echo-Doppler cardiography perform flow velocity analysis . Zoomed fluoroscopy perform record two orthogonal view evaluate stent integrity stent fracture . It intention include 20 patient study follow-up clinic .
